body_content.explanation: a very old story or set of stories from ancient times, or the stories, not always true, that people tell about a famous event or person:
examples: The dance was based on several Hindu legends.
She is writing a thesis on Irish legend and mythology.
Legend has it (= people say) that he always wore his boots in bed.
This match will go into tennis legend (= it will always be remembered).

body_content.explanation: someone very famous and admired, usually because of their ability in a particular area:
examples: Jazz legend Ella Fitzgerald once sang in this bar.

body_content.explanation: the words written on or next to a picture, map, coin, etc. that explain what it is about or what the symbols on it mean
